title: Every Part of You: Taunts Me
description: Elliott made a mistake in pushing Simone away, but is it too late for him to pull her close again?Admitting to Simone that he really likes her is a big step for Elliott, but before they can move on with this new relationship, there are some things they need to get straight. Amused by his “guidelines,” Simone is willing to try to understand Elliott’s point of view, so long as he gives her what she wants, too. Everything seems to be moving along until a misunderstanding about Simone’s relationship with an ex lover forces them to face their real feelings for each other.
author: Megan Hart
